reg_info.full_title: O. Reg. 107/01: DELEGATION OF AUTHORITY - TOWNSHIP OF SIOUX NARROWS-NESTOR FALLS
reg_info.reg_name_text: DELEGATION OF AUTHORITY — TOWNSHIP OF SIOUX NARROWS-NESTOR FALLS
reg_info.citation: O. Reg. 107/01: DELEGATION OF AUTHORITY - TOWNSHIP OF SIOUX NARROWS-NESTOR FALLS
reg_info.act_under: Planning Act   Loi sur l’aménagement du territoire

content.content: 1. All authority of the Minister under the following provisions is delegated to the council of the Township of Sioux Narrows-Nestor Falls with respect to all applications made on or after March 30, 2001 for land in that municipality: 1. Subsection 50 (18) of the Act, to give approvals. 2. Section 53 of the Act, to give consents. 3. Section 57 of the Act, to issue certificates of validation. O. Reg. 107/01, s. 1.
content.raw_html:
1. All authority of the Minister under the following provisions is delegated to the council of the Township of Sioux Narrows-Nestor Falls with respect to all applications made on or after March 30, 2001 for land in that municipality:

1. Subsection 50 (18) of the Act, to give approvals.

2. Section 53 of the Act, to give consents.

3. Section 57 of the Act, to issue certificates of validation. O. Reg. 107/01, s. 1.

content.content: 2. All authority of the Minister under section 53 of the Act to give consents is delegated to the council of the Township of Sioux Narrows-Nestor Falls with respect to all applications made before March 30, 2001 whose files are set out in the Schedule. O. Reg. 107/01, s. 2.
content.raw_html: 2. All authority of the Minister under section 53 of the Act to give consents is delegated to the council of the Township of Sioux Narrows-Nestor Falls with respect to all applications made before March 30, 2001 whose files are set out in the Schedule. O. Reg. 107/01, s. 2.

content.content: 3. (1) If any authority delegated under section 1 or 2 is further delegated by the council to a committee of the council or to an appointed officer under subsection 5 (1) of the Act, the council shall forward to the Minister a certified copy of the delegating by-law within 15 days of its passing. O. Reg. 107/01, s. 3 (1). (2) A delegation of authority set out in this Regulation is not terminated by reason only that subsection (1) is not complied with. O. Reg. 107/01, s. 3 (2).
content.raw_html:
3. (1) If any authority delegated under section 1 or 2 is further delegated by the council to a committee of the council or to an appointed officer under subsection 5 (1) of the Act, the council shall forward to the Minister a certified copy of the delegating by-law within 15 days of its passing. O. Reg. 107/01, s. 3 (1).

(2) A delegation of authority set out in this Regulation is not terminated by reason only that subsection (1) is not complied with. O. Reg. 107/01, s. 3 (2).

content.content: 4. Omitted (provides for amendments to other Regulations). O. Reg. 107/01, s. 4.
content.raw_html: 4. Omitted (provides for amendments to other Regulations). O. Reg. 107/01, s. 4.

content.content: 5. Omitted (provides for coming into force of provisions of this Regulation). O. Reg. 107/01, s. 5. SCHEDULE 59C 000003 O. Reg. 107/01, Sched.
content.raw_html:
5. Omitted (provides for coming into force of provisions of this Regulation). O. Reg. 107/01, s. 5.

SCHEDULE

59C 000003

O. Reg. 107/01, Sched.
